int wapi_get_ifnames ( wapi_list_t *  list  ) 

Parses WAPI_PROC_NET_WIRELESS according to hardcoded mechanisms in linux/net/wireless/wext-proc.c sources.

Parameters:
[out] list Pushes collected wapi_string_t into this list.
